name: Treasure Supply [Concept Demo]
description:
The story stars Miel, an experienced member of the Treasurers Guild, and her trainees: Tara Rose, Sabine Wolf, and Nana Creal.  The Treasurers Guild has the sole duty of filling the treasure chests that heroes often find in dungeons. I know that may sound lame BUT not just anyone is capable of doing that. 

..And yes, this description is a prototype as well. I made this game for a 24 hour rtp game jam so I couldn't think much on a description, sorry.

Warning: game has cursing and sexual innuendos.
